items.name: AllowMerginigWithOtherRanges
lines: If the highlighted range is visually highlighted and this member is TRUE, the range given in RangeRepresentation may be included in a merged range rectangle spanning a bigger range.

items.name: Index
lines: Only take the cell at position Index out of the given Range.
If this value is -1 take the whole sequence.

items.name: PreferredColor
lines: Use this color for marking the range.
This color may be ignored and replaced by a better fitting color, if it would be otherwise not well visible.

items.name: RangeRepresentation
lines: The range representation string of the highlighted range.
